title: Pork Carnitas
directions: Rinse and dry pork. Cut into several large pieces. Salt and pepper. Mix oregano, cumin, chili powder and olive oil. Rub over pork. Place on grate in oven safe pan.
Add one cup water and Liquid Smoke to pan.
Top with onion, garlic and jalapeno. Squeeze over juice from oranges then place pieces on pork. Cover and cook for three hours. Remove pork and save juices.
Once cool, shred meat, place on roasting pan, baste with juices and put in hot oven. Cook until becoming crispy. Baste occasionally.
